channel.title: What puts you in a good mood?
channel.description:
I'm not talking about getting angry when you die on a private server, I'm talking about everyday life.
What chills you out / gets you in a good mood.
I've been pretty damn angry lately, and I'd just like some advice. (No I don't plan on slitting my wrists or anything stupid like that).

item.title: What puts you in a good mood?
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

[quote=“Andrew Ferguson, post:98, topic:421212”][quote author=Andrew Ferguson link=topic=523875.msg3818658#msg3818658 date=1321572973]

Dancing and singing at my neighborhood park at night wearing a mask and wait for other people who go outside at night past curfue to hang out with friends there. I love being messed up mentally.

Andrew you shouldn’t do that, that’s a no no.

Andrew stop arguing with yourself, it’s weird.
[/quote]
Quick look away, they’re talking about us!

Yes I know I forgot the Mnt dew, shut up you werido![/quote]
Andrew this makes me love you more.

Read full topic

item.title: What puts you in a good mood?
item.dc:creator: @Acorn1 Acorn_
item.description:
@Acorn1 wrote:

[quote=“m1lkman, post:75, topic:421212”][quote author=reyx7 link=topic=523875.msg3811431#msg3811431 date=1320965507]
Ecstasy increases self confidence and general comfort, and a new 2011 study from Harvard saying it’s 100% non addictive. And it makes you want to dance!
[/quote]

Spinal fluid[/quote]
I’ve done Ecstasy three times in my life, it’s not good at all for you.
Infact, it’s terrible.
You don’t know who mixed your pills so there’s the possibility that your liver will get fucked up (because there is no such thing as a clean “Ecstasy”. Not only that, it causes memory lost and I’m not just talking about next day what the fuck happends I’m talking about alzheimer 15 or so years in the future.

So yeah, I’m gonna go smoke a bowl now.

Read full topic
